1.0.name: wordpress/custom-author-permalink
1.0.description:
Important Notice This plugin is deprecated (although still working) and will no longer be maintained. Its functionality has been re-written and improved on WP htaccess Control which you should be using instead.

Custom Author Permalink adds a simple panel under Settings where you’ll be able to change the wordpress author permalink base (/author/) to any other string. Take a look at the screenshot..
